name: MagicalVacationPlanner
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Magical Vacation Planner will now be able to bring you tips on travel, as well as bring you featured vendors.

Magical Vacation Planner clients will tell you that the personal service is the most valuable part of a travel experience. It’s difficult to make wonderful memories while being stressed over the details. That’s why we always say, “Experience the Magic; Leave the Planning to Us!”
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
